attributes.action: allow us to defend our property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are asking for the right to defend our property,
Over the past few years the law seems to protect the criminal who enters people's property without my permission to steal, Rob and even kill people yet we are expected not to defend ourselves?
The police in my area are not Interested and often take upto 3hrs to respond to anything.
I am asking for you to give people the power to defend what they have worked to build and to protect their family without the law protecting the offender who as no right to be anywhere near anyone's property unless given permission.
In certain circumstances the offender as sued the property owner who was only defending what is rightfully his/hers.
I have a young family and live in an high crime area and why should i live in fear that i cant even defend my own family?
I dont want the right to kill or use arms all i am asking is to able to protect my family and to look after what i have worked to get!!
